characterDescription: Abronai is a male mateform Parshendi who serves on their ruling council, the Council of Five, in their city of Narak.

characterDetails.Appearance: His mateform is lush and plump, though he controls its passions. Still, he would have preferred to have another form.
characterDetails.History:
Initially, Abronai is supportive of all Parshendi assuming stormform, but once he witnesses the changes it brings on Eshonai, he opposes the idea.
He was later taken into custody with the other Parshendi who refused to assume stormform.
characterDetails.Beliefs:
He believes that Eshonai has both the strength and experience to transform into stormform
More than that, he believes that Venli is too close to the project. Further, that if Eshonai enters the storms and discovers that something is off about the form, she can halt the experiment and return to them.
